title: China’s crackdown on cryptocurrencies

The post China’s crackdown on cryptocurrencies appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was three minutes ahead of the competition on Sept 24 with news that the Chinese government was stepping up its crackdown on cryptocurrencies with a blanket ban on all transactions and mining. 

The post China’s crackdown on cryptocurrencies appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
